info.title: Administration
info.communityInfo: Contact the SCM-Manager support team for questions about SCM-Manager, to report bugs or to request features through the official channels.
info.enterpriseInfo: You require support with the integration of SCM-Manager into your processes, with the customization of the tool or simply a service level agreement (SLA)?
info.enterprisePartner: Contact our development partner Cloudogu! Their team is looking forward to discussing your individual requirements with you and will be more than happy to give you a quote.

modal.restart: Restart to make plugin changes effective
modal.author: Author
modal.dependencyNotification: With this plugin, the following dependencies will be installed if they are not available yet!
modal.installedNotification: Successfully installed plugin. You have to reload the page, to see ui changes:
modal.updatedNotification: Successfully updated plugin. You have to reload the page, to see ui changes:
modal.uninstalledNotification: Successfully uninstalled plugin. You have to reload the page, to see ui changes:
modal.executedChangesNotification: Successfully executed plugin changes. You have to reload the page, to see ui changes:
modal.restartNotification: You should only restart the scm-manager context if no one else is currently working with it.
modal.executePending: The following plugin changes will be executed and after that the scm-manager context will be restarted.
modal.cancelPending: The following plugin changes will be canceled.
modal.updateAllInfo: The following plugin changes will be executed. You need to restart the scm-manager to make these changes effective.

confirmAlert.title: Delete Permission Role
confirmAlert.message: Do you really want to delete this permission role? All users will lose their corresponding permissions.
